import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { NotebookService } from '../services/notebook.service'; /*import { Notebook } from '../services/notebook.service';*/ @Component({ selector: 'app-notes', templateUrl: './notes.component.html', styleUrls: ['./notes.component.css'] }) export class NotesComponent { // public notesList = [{}]; public notesList: [{ noteId: number; noteHeader: string; noteText: string; reminderDate: Date; notestags: [] }] | undefined; constructor(public notebook: NotebookService) { //this.notes = notebook.getNotes().subscribe(notes => { this.notesList = notes; }) } }
